com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates

Class CampaignCriterionDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractBaseDelegate<S>
      • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractGetDelegate<T,S>
        • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractGetMutateDelegate<com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterion,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterionOperation,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterionServiceInterface>
          • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.CampaignCriterionDelegate

  • public final class CampaignCriterionDelegate
extends AbstractGetMutateDelegate<com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterion,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterionOperation,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201409.cm.CampaignCriterionServiceInterface>
    Specific AbstractGetMutateDelegate for CampaignCriterion.

    Implementation is not thread-safe, because AdWordsSession and Apache Axis service objects are not thread-safe.

    Author:
    Julian Toledo
